page.description: The requested page number. Must be positive.

pageSize.description: The number of items per page. Must be between 1 and 50.

responses.200: Successful retrieval. Body contains 'items' (array of {id: string, name: string}), 'totalItems' (int), 'currentPage' (int), 'totalPages' (int).
responses.400: Invalid pagination parameters (e.g., non-integer page/pageSize, out-of-range pageSize, non-positive page).

invaraints: Each item must have a unique string 'id'.
Item names must be non-empty and not exceed 100 characters.
`pageSize` parameter must be within 1 to 50, inclusive.
